id.description: The unique identifier for the vote

pollId.description: ID of the poll being voted on

userId.description: ID of the user who cast the vote

voterId.description: ID of the voter (user or delegate)

data.description: Vote payload. Shape depends on the poll voting mode. Must include mode matching the poll. Allowed: (1) normal: mode and data array of option indices as strings. (2) point: mode and data object mapping option index to points. (3) rank: mode and data array of objects with option and points, rank 1 = first choice. (4) blind: mode, commitment, proof, revealed; optional actualVote, randomness, revealedAt after reveal.

mode.description: Must match the poll voting mode

updatedAt.description: When the vote was last updated
